doctor.name: Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Daud
doctor.specialty: Colorectal (Piles, Fistula, Fisher & Rectal Cancer) Specialist Surgeon
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Daud is a Colorectal Surgeon in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, FRCS (Edin), FRCS (Glasg), FRCS (Eng), FRCSI. He is a Professor & Head, Surgery at Jalalabad Ragib-Rabeya Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Colorectal Center, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. A.K.M. Daud at Colorectal Center, Sylhet is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Karim Manzil, Manikpir Road, Nayasarak, Sylhet

doctor.name: Dr. Mohammad Abdul Quadir
doctor.workplace: Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital
doctor.info: Dr. Mohammad Abdul Quadir is a General Surgeon in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS (CU), BCS (Health), FCPS (Surgery), Fellow (Colorectal Surgery). He is a Assistant Professor, Surgery at Sylhet MAG Osmani Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Mount Adora Hospital, Akhalia, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Dr. Mohammad Abdul Quadir at Mount Adora Hospital, Akhalia, Sylhet is 4pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Prof. Dr. Jamal Ahmed Chowdhury
doctor.info: Prof. Dr. Jamal Ahmed Chowdhury is a General Surgeon in Sylhet. His qualification is MBBS, FCPS (Surgery). He is a Professor & Head, Surgery at Sylhet Womens Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Ibn Sina Hospital, Sylhet. Practicing hour of Prof. Dr. Jamal Ahmed Chowdhury at Ibn Sina Hospital, Sylhet is Evening (Closed: Friday).
